text:
There are ten sprinters in the finals of a race. How many different ways can the
gold, silver, and bronze medals be awarded?
A. 120.
B. 720.
C. 1,440.
For more questions related to this topic review, log in to your Schweser online account and
launch SchweserPro TM QBank; and for video instruction covering each LOS in this topic
review, log in to your Schweser online account and launch the OnDemand video lectures, if
you have purchased these products.
